comment:
{
    "VARIABLES": "Let x be the number of children's vaccines and y be the number of adult vaccines",
    "CONSTRAINTS": [
        "50x + 75y \leq 20000",
        "x \geq 50",
        "y \geq 0.7(x + y)",
        "x \geq 0",
        "y \geq 0"
    ],
    "OBJECTIVE": "Minimize 50x + 75y"
}
